item.title: How to make a command freeze player?
item.dc:creator: @Fight247 Fight247
item.description:
@Fight247 wrote:

Hello,

I am making a freeze command for players thatusing 1-4 items.

Here is my command,

[code] if (command.startsWith(“freeze”) && playerRights > 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(7);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been freezed for using 1-4 items!.");
                    p.sM(
                            "You cant move now for 3 minutes!");
                    p.stillgfx(369);
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try to enter the name that you want to freeze!");
            }
        }[/code]

But now how to make it freeze the player?
the gfx is 369, that is the barrage GFX.

Please help me,

Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a command freeze player?
